summary: Blacklisted in modern day WW2, a Swedish oil trader opts to assist British Allies, by means of infiltrating and surveying Nazi Germany.
cast: William Holden|Lilli Palmer|Hugh Griffith|Carl Raddatz|Ernst Schröder|Charles Regnier|Ingrid van Bergen|Wolfgang Preiss|Werner Peters|Erica Beer|Stefan Schnabel|Klaus Kinski|Erik Schumann|Poul Reichhardt|John Wittig|Louis Miehe-Renard|Kai Holm|Jens Østerholm|Jørgen Krogh|Eva Dahlbeck|Ulf Palme|John Banner|Martin Berliner|Jochen Blume|Phil Brown|Max Buchsbaum|Peter Capell|Ejner Federspiel|Eva Fiebig|Helo Gutschwager|Holger Hagen|Dirk Hansen|Reinhard Kolldehoff|Gottfried Kramer|Karl-Heinz Kreienbaum|Ulrich Matschoss|Günter Meisner|Ludwig Meybert|Preben Neergaard|Bendt Rothe|Albert Rueprecht|Friedrich Schütter|Horst-Dieter Sievers|Ted Taylor|Werner Van Deeg|Georg Völmmer
keywords: spy|copenhagen denmark|reference to adolf hitler|surveillance|city in ruins
title: Espía por mandato
